main_definition: To move from one place, person, or form to another; to convey or hand over something or someone.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exchanging money in a bank or financial institution
meanings_and_examples.example: He went to the bank and transferred $500 from his checking account into his savings account.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Moving data or information between different storage devices or locations
meanings_and_examples.example: She used a USB drive to transfer her photos from her computer to another one.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Shifting the responsibility for something to someone else
meanings_and_examples.example: The manager decided to transfer some of his workload to his assistant in order to focus on other tasks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relocating or moving from one place, person, or group to another
meanings_and_examples.example: Due to the job opportunity, she transferred to a new city and started working at a different company.
